name: Talk Luther
_source: speak;Luther;I still can't believe you're working for Morrissey.
speak;SoldierBlue;Hah, you wish you could land a position like this, you old codger.
speak;Luther;Oh?{w} And do what? Stand in the same spot all day?
speak;Luther;Certainly far from roaming the land, slaying giants like back in the day.
speak;SoldierBlue;Aye, I'll give you that one.
speak;SoldierBlue;And so are you, by the look of you.
speak;Simon;Is this a friend of yours?
speak;Luther;We fought together a long time ago.
speak;Luther;So, it was a bit of a shock to run into each other here.
speak;Luther;I guess Fate has a way of bringing people together.
